prompt: The woman sits at her desk maintaining eye contact with a warm, pleasant smile. Subtle breathing motion and natural blinking. High stability. No speaking, no sound.
The woman is listening intently. She gives a slow, encouraging head nod with slightly raised eyebrows. Engaged expression. No speaking, no sound.
The woman tilts her head slightly to the right in a charming, inquisitive way. She smiles with her eyes (smizing). Stable background. No speaking, no sound.
The woman bites her lower lip slightly in a pensive, thinking expression while looking at the screen, then relaxes back into a smile. No speaking, no sound.
The woman performs a rapid double-blink as if processing a thought, then widens her eyes slightly. A very subtle, natural reaction. No speaking, no sound.
The woman breaks eye contact to look deeply into the upper right corner for a moment, as if recalling a memory, then snaps her gaze back to the camera with a smile. No speaking, no sound.
A very subtle, micro-shrug of one shoulder, accompanied by a playful, knowing smirk. Alexis Rose energy. No speaking, no sound.
The woman looks down at her laptop screen as if reading a chat message, her eyes scanning left to right, then looks back up to the camera. No speaking, no sound.
The woman performs a micro-movement of tilting her head and adjusting her posture as if checking her hair in the viewfinder, without raising her hands. Vanity check. No speaking, no sound.
The woman shifts her weight in the chair, sitting up a little straighter. A reset of energy. She remains focused on the camera. No speaking, no sound.
The woman raises one eyebrow slightly with a playful, skeptical look, then returns to a neutral smile. Friendly banter vibe. No speaking, no sound.
The woman presses her lips together and puffs a tiny breath as if holding back a laugh. Her eyes crinkle with amusement. No speaking, no sound.
